title: Earth Observation Tech Radar
subtitle: Earth Observation Tech Radar for Downstream Science, Analytics, and Applications

entries.name: Python
entries.description: Primary language across EO ingestion, analytics, and production model workflows.

entries.name: GDAL + PROJ
entries.description: Foundational geospatial I/O and coordinate transformation stack for raster and vector processing.

entries.name: PostgreSQL + PostGIS
entries.description: Core transactional and spatial query layer that underpins many EO products and APIs.

entries.name: S3-Compatible Object Storage
entries.description: Baseline storage contract for cloud-native geospatial data lakes and tile assets.

entries.name: GeoPandas
entries.description: Core dataframe API for vector processing and geospatial data engineering.

entries.name: Rasterio
entries.description: Standard raster read/write and windowed access library in Python EO pipelines.

entries.name: Xarray
entries.description: Default multidimensional model for time-series and gridded EO analysis.

entries.name: Dask
entries.description: Parallel execution backbone for scaling EO preprocessing and analytics workloads.

entries.name: Apache Parquet
entries.description: Columnar storage baseline for high-volume geospatial tabular data.

entries.name: JupyterLab
entries.description: Primary interactive workspace for geospatial exploration, notebooks, and review.

entries.name: QGIS
entries.description: Default desktop GIS for spatial editing, QA, and analyst workflows.

entries.name: DuckDB + Spatial
entries.description: Fast local analytics on parquet and geospatial data with minimal setup.

entries.name: TiTiler
entries.description: Dynamic tile serving for raster assets and cloud-native imagery.

entries.name: Polars
entries.description: High-performance DataFrame processing for geospatial ETL support.

entries.name: Custom WebGL Terrain Pipelines
entries.description: Promising for advanced rendering, but complexity is still high.

entries.name: Human-in-the-Loop QA
entries.description: Critical review checkpoints before production release of new detections.

entries.name: Active Learning for Labeling
entries.description: Use model uncertainty to prioritize human review and reduce labeling costs.

entries.name: Edge Inference for EO
entries.description: Early-stage experiments for low-latency, low-bandwidth deployments.

entries.name: Semantic Search on Embeddings
entries.description: Supports cross-region similarity queries over EO features and annotations.

entries.name: Rule-Only Change Detection
entries.description: Too brittle alone; use in combination with learning-based methods.

entries.name: Cloud Optimized GeoTIFF (COG)
entries.description: Primary raster format for cloud access and selective reads.

entries.name: OpenStreetMap
entries.description: Core baseline dataset for roads, places, and contextual mapping layers.

entries.name: GeoParquet
entries.description: Preferred columnar format for vector analytics and lakehouse storage.

entries.name: Synthetic Training Data
entries.description: Useful for augmentation, but realism and bias controls need care.

entries.name: Heavy Shapefile Archives
entries.description: Legacy interchange format kept only where backward compatibility is required.

entries.name: STAC API
entries.description: Default interface for searchable geospatial catalogs and metadata discovery.

entries.name: OGC API - Features
entries.description: Modern replacement path for feature services where interoperability matters.

entries.name: PMTiles
entries.description: Single-file vector tile delivery with easy CDN distribution.

entries.name: GeoZarr
entries.description: Emerging chunked format for multidimensional geospatial arrays.

entries.name: Vendor-Locked Metadata Schemas
entries.description: Avoid when possible to reduce migration cost and integration risk.
